mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PAYMENT(PAYNUM, BOOKNUM, PAYDATE, PAYAMOUNT) VALUES ( #{payNum},#{bookNum},SYSDATE,#{payAmount})
INSERT INTO REFUND(REFUNDNUM, PAYNUM, REFUNDAMOUNT, REFUNDDATE, REFUNDREASON, REFUNDCHECK) VALUES (REFUND_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{payNum},#{refundAmount},SYSDATE, #{refundReason}, #{refundCheck})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM R, P.* FROM (SELECT * FROM PAYMENT WHERE PAYNUM>0 AND BOOKNUM LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%' ORDER BY BOOKNUM DESC)P) WHERE R BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{lastRow}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM R, P.* FROM (SELECT * FROM REFUND WHERE REFUNDNUM>0 AND REFUNDNUM LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%' AND REFUNDCHECK=1 ORDER BY PARTNERNUM DESC)P) WHERE R BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{lastRow}
SELECT COUNT(REFUNDNUM) FROM REFUND WHERE REFUNDCHECK=1
